identified-content.object.title: Outward Bound (TV Program)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

abstract.p: Devlyn Parker, Jhaleh Akhavan and Charles Norman are among eight teenagers who explore Australian outback, and meaning of teamwork, in four episodes of weekly Outward Bound series on Discovery; photo (S)

block.p: Devlyn Parker, front left, Jhaleh Akhavan and Charles Norman (back) are among eight intrepid teenagers who explore the Australian outback, and the meaning of teamwork, in four episodes of the weekly ''Outward Bound'' series (Saturdays at 11 a.m. on Discovery).

Devlyn Parker, front left, Jhaleh Akhavan and Charles Norman (back) are among eight intrepid teenagers who explore the Australian outback, and the meaning of teamwork, in four episodes of the weekly ''Outward Bound'' series (Saturdays at 11 a.m. on Discovery).
